title: Teacher Competency Development Workshop in Hybrid Synchronous Video-Mediated Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Utilization Skills and Understanding of Changes in Educational Environments
context.additional_context: Focuses on teacher teams collaboratively developing innovative learning designs based on the IT-Pedagogical Think Tank Model. Structured around hands-on practice using diverse platforms and tools

learning_goals: Participants can design three or more effective teaching strategies in hybrid synchronous learning environments.
Participants can operate collaborative processes among teacher teams by applying the IT-pedagogical think tank model.
Participants can suggest two or more interaction-enhancement methods using video-mediated learning tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
